name: TJ King
text: If your looking for pizza this is not the place to order it from, it was way over cooked so dry that it made 29 palms look refreshing. It wasn't even cut into slices. By far the worst Papa John's experience i have ever had we tried to eat …More

name: Cordero Bearden
text: With it being on base, they're pretty slow even if you live 5 mins away. I think its mainly due to the fact that teens work there so they don't know the essence of having a good work ethic. Food is good. Just slow and sometimes mess order up.

name: Hunter O’Neil
text: The Pizza tastes fine and all.. but let’s talk about the customer service. They take an eternity to complete an order, even for carry out. Many times now I’ve walked in to get my pizza and seen 6-8 employees not doing anything just hanging …More

name: isaac nievez
text: I’m speechless

name: O'Connecting Worldwide
text: Great place! Last time, they forgot to add another topping to my pizza and the manager gave me a refund and another pizza for free. She was very nice and professional, no attitude. I was not expecting to get a refund, because all I needed …More

name: Sean Devine
text: Ordered online used a coupon, great price. Had my order ready in 15 minutes. Made exactly to order. Hot and fresh.

name: Sam Roub
text: Ordered a large order, never come and wouldn’t pick up their phone

name: Meadmasters paisley
text: Delicious pizza with perfect crust

name: LoveNever Failz
text: Fast and friendly crew!

name: Frank Benitez
text: I Love Papa Johns. Always tastes great. Pineapple on pizza IS acceptable in my book.

name: Ronan Bobby
text: Took over 3 hours for my pizza to get to me. On two occasions

name: mac erskine
text: Gave me dominos number (Thanks Dude)

name: patrik raeside
text: Great food, very fast

name: Ark Surge
text: The pizza is very inconsistent depending on the cook or the manager who made the food. If the person sauced the cheese evenly and took the time and effort to spread the toppings, cheese and sauce, the pizza will taste amazing. If that is …More

name: Cynthia Anonuevo
text: We always buy pizza at least twice a month for dinner because Papa John's pizza are not too pricey and they taste good. We also like their garlic knots and the cheese sticks are the best with garlic sauce

name: Timothy Bolin
text: 9 times out of 10 they will forget the extra sauce you paid for the first time, but they will always come back out to deliver the sauce

name: Samantha Hance
text: Our order was over 30 minutes late and didn't even apologize! Its ridiculous! The app said it was ready and we still had to wait an extra 30 minutes for carryout

name: DeAndrea Wiley
text: Customer service is at an all time low.

name: Marwan Santana
text: As usual a good pizza for a great price...

name: erick hurley
text: I love me some papas but this one is cheap. They dont put much cheese on their pizzas.

name: Dominique Rengani
text: Just had food delivered to me promptly. But unfortunately when I sat down to eat they brought me a pizza that isn't mine. Or they messed up my order. Not a big deal but it is important that they don't put the wrong toppings on pizza

name: Joseph Gaus
text: At first their regular menu prices were shocking for someone used to mainland prices, but after living in island they're average for pizza. They have good deals if you sign up for their emails, and the quality of pizza has always been great.

name: Jerrell Watson
text: As a military member its kinda hurtful that they think its ok severing us in the conditions of the restaurant. The place os never clean, and the mold thats visible on the soda machine is mind blowing. People look at that everyday and do …More

name: Amanda Claypool
text: I've never had better costumer service here on this island until the paper johns on the marine corps base. Logan is amazing. Thanks for making our experience great.

name: LeAnna Jerabek
text: Pizza is always yummy and on time. In store customer service is lacking.

name: Trevor Henson
text: Quick cheap and freindly

name: mike good
text: The customer service is definitely good, but their pizza just isn't that good. The toppings are average and the crust is pretty bland. The only thing keeping their number in my phone is the location being so close to my house.

name: Adam Riggs
text: Always has quick and good service. Also delivers on base.

name: Erin Bunten
text: Great pizza and wings. Unless you get delivery.. you will wait at least an hour and everything will be cold :(

name: Hector Santos
text: Good pizza. Pricey, but good.

name: Jason Runner
text: Grabbed one of there medium pizzas to go they already had ready for only 7 dollars was really nice !

name: Cassie
text: I placed an order and waited over a hour waiting for it to arrive. I called to see what the hold up was and was told the driver was behind and it will be here in 25-30 min. Its not even a 5 minute drive from where i live....

name: Havok ArtsTM
text: Great pizza, excellent deals. Better carry-out options.

name: Colin Earl
text: Great prices, food, service, and lunch buffet

name: John Kavanagh
text: I don't know why ANY pizza should cost $25.00. We need more Little Ceasers Pizza.

name: Cristian Corona
text: Rude

name: QuincyMC
text: Ordered multiple times via website.  Always hot and fresh with speedy delivery.

name: Ben Weiss
text: Decent and quick Papa John's

name: Buddy Stallworth
text: Best pizza in the world

name: Zx2Nick
text: Expensive, timely, but good pizza

name: Xavier White
text: Great taste

name: Jayson Quintas
text: Keeps getting better and better. Wish delivery times could get somewhat faster!!!

name: Dylan Perritt
text: 10/10 would recommend

name: brad porter
text: Its pizza it hard to go wrong!

name: lisset lopez
text: Took three hours to get our pizza because they got the wrong address but It's really good pizza

name: Chidi Opara
text: Thrash

name: Andrew Leath
text: Always awesome pizza

name: christopher brusich
text: The pizza is okay; greasy. The restaurant is usually dirty.

name: Derrian Bolds
text: Took to long for delivery

name: Samuel Torres
text: Yummy cheap

name: Ryan Cadwallader
text: Absolute worst service I've ever encountered.  Each time I've called, they've seemed annoyed by the fact that I want food.  After only three orders, I'm done with these people.
